abilityEffect: Whenever you attach a [D] Energy card from your hand to Rocket's Raikou ex, you may choose 1 of the Defending Pokémon and switch it with 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. Your opponent chooses the Benched Pokémon to switch. This power can't be used if Rocket's Raikou ex is affected by a Special Condition.

effect.en: Does 40 damage plus 10 more damage for each [L] Energy attached to Rocket's Raikou ex.
